oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter to Mr. J. H. Griffith
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to Mr. J. H. Griffith from unknown writer who was located at a camp between Williamston and Georgetown, Kentucky. Letter discusses marching through Kentucy from Cumberland's Gap and seeing dead Union soldiers in Richmond. Also comments on horses, cattle, prices, and how the bad the water is in Kentucky.
